post_message: A heartless driver shoved a dog out of an SUV, then sped away as the abandoned pet desperately scrambled to get back in.   The dog was struck by another vehicle as it chased after the driver on a Long Island road. Incredibly, the canine survived.   Suffolk County SPCA is offering a reward to find the person who abandoned the dog. The driver's vehicle is described only as a dark green, early 2000s Jeep Cherokee.
